attributes.action: Look At the State of This Country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i'm 50 years old and have severed this country in the armed services and i'm appalled at the state this country has got into.
Imigration is now at pandemic praportions and the govement doesnt know how many their are in the country, and yet they still let them in.
I'm also appalled by the way this govement treats their own people and just seem to rough ride them and thier thought, it seems in the country if you are from another land you get treated far better than if you come from this country.
The govement are wondering why droves of people are leaving here, well they should look closely at what they have done for us, i/e absolutly nothing apart from tax us to the hilt on everything including having fun and is fast becoming a joke, i for one would leave in a heart beat if i could afford it, and also if i had to serve my country again , i would blatantly refuse, never before have i seen this country in such a mess.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
